font-select.title: Sélectionner la police
font-select.japanese-supported: Cette police est compatible avec les hiraganas, les katakanas et les kanjis (Japonais)
font-select.russian-supported: Cette police est compatible avec le cyrillique (Russe)
font-select.korean-supported: Cette police est compatible avec le hangul (Coréen)
font-select.chinese-supported: Cette police est compatible avec les hanzi (Chinois)

create-custom-reward.first-use-warning:
<cr>Warning</c>
Cette fonctionnalité changera votre fichier de sauvegarde définitivement, ce qui peut vous faire bannir du leaderboard.
<cl>Utilisez-la à vos risques et périls</c>

labels.none-added-hint:
Aucun label ajouté.
Vous pouvez <cc>ajouter</c> des labels avec les
<cl>boutons</c> sur le côté <cp>droit</c>.

preview-error-none.title: Prévisualiser l'animation
preview-error-none.text: Il n'y a pas d'animation à prévisualiser.

names.show-hitboxes-on-death: Montrer les Hitboxes à la Mort
names.no-particles-adv/player-trail-particles: Particules de la trainée en Ship
names.stop-triggers-on-death: Arrêter les Triggers à la Mort
names.wave-trail-size: Taille de la Trainée en Wave
names.no-spider-dash: Pas d'effet de Dash en Spider
names.plat-jump-anim: Pas d'Animation de Saut en Plat
names.no-dash-fire: Pas de Feu lors d'un Dash
names.safe-mode/end-screen-cheat-indicator: Indicateur de Triche dans l'Ecran de Fin

descriptions.safe-mode: Désactive la progression ou les statistiques gagnées sur le niveau
descriptions.safe-mode/change-text: Change le texte sur l'écran de fin pour mettre en évidence le fait que la complétion n'est pas légitime
descriptions.show-touches: Affiche un cercle à l'écran à chaque clic
descriptions.classic-percentage: Change l'affichage du pourcentage en le calculant en fonction de la distance et non du temps comme avant la 2.2
descriptions.best-in-percentage: Affiche le record dans la barre de pourcentage
descriptions.accurate-percentage: Permet d'afficher un nombre illimité de décimales sur le pourcentage
descriptions.hitbox-trail/reset-positions-on-death: Réinitialise les positions à chaque tentative
descriptions.show-hitboxes-on-death: Montre les hitboxes des objets après une mort
descriptions.no-particles-adv/dash-orb-particles: Désactive les particules lorsqu'une dash orb est utilisée
descriptions.no-particles-adv/coin-particles: Désactive les particules lorsqu'un collectible est obtenu (ex : pièces)
descriptions.no-particles-adv/end-portal-particles: Désactive les particules qui viennent du portail de fin
descriptions.no-particles-adv/speed-change-particles: Désactive les particules qui apparaissent dans le fond lorsque la vitesse du joueur change
descriptions.no-particles-adv/particle-objects: Désactive les particules que les créateurs ont placé dans l'éditeur
descriptions.no-particles: Désactive toutes les particules en jeu
descriptions.auto-safe-mode: Active automatiquement le Mode Sécurité lorsqu'un mode de triche est activé
descriptions.trans-bg: Met la couleur de fond en blanc
descriptions.trans-bg/only-blue:
Change uniquement les fonds bleus. 
Peut altérer certains endroit comme la Chambre Forte si cette option est désactivée
descriptions.char-limit: Permet d'écrire un nombre illimité de lettres dans toutes les zones de saisie
descriptions.char-filter: Permet d'écrire n'importe quel caractère dans toutes les zones de saisie
descriptions.slider-limit: Permet aux curseurs d'être déplacés de manière illimitée
descriptions.slider-limit/reset-audio-variables: Réinitialise le curseur audio à <cc>100%</c> au cas où il serait hors de l'écran et inatteignable
descriptions.practice-bypass: Débloque l'option "Practice Music Sync" dans le menu de pause
descriptions.pitch-shifter: Change la hauteur de l'audio du jeu
descriptions.speedhack/gameplay: Change la vitesse uniquement en jeu et sur l'éditeur
descriptions.speedhack/enabled: Le modifieur de vitesse est-il activé ?
descriptions.no-trans: Désactive les transitions en fondu entre les écrans
descriptions.music-bypass: Unlocks the menu and practice music buttons
descriptions.hide-pause-button: Hides the pause button in game, requires reopening level to apply
descriptions.frame-extrapolation: Smooths between frames by predicting where the player will be the next frame using its velocity.
descriptions.december-snow: Adds snow to the main menu during <cc>december</c>.
descriptions.syzzi.click_between_frames/soft-toggle: Toggles the "CBF Enabled" option in the cbf mod settings
descriptions.chest-unlock-bypass: Allows you to open any chest in the <cc>treasure room</c>
descriptions.startpos-switcher: Switch between start positions in the level at any time
descriptions.startpos-switcher/use-percentage: Shows the percentage that each start position is at
descriptions.startpos-switcher/hide-ui: Hides the UI and makes it non-interactable
descriptions.smart-startpos: Automatically adjusts the settings of a startpos to correctly set the gamemode, speed, gravity, etc
descriptions.custom-respawn-time: Change how long it takes to respawn
descriptions.instant-restart: Instantly restart a level when you die
descriptions.pause-quests: Adds a button to open the quests menu in the pause menu
descriptions.practice-complete: Allows you to complete a level in practice mode if you beat it in <cr>one</c> attempt
descriptions.instant-reverse: Makes the mirror portal transition instant
descriptions.pause-icon-kit: Adds a button to open the icon kit in the pause menu
descriptions.freeze-attempts: Freezes your attempt count stat and on level
descriptions.hide-player: Forces all players to be invisible
descriptions.show-player: Forces all players to be visible
descriptions.force-plat:
Force Platformer mode on all levels.
Reopen level to apply.
descriptions.conf-res: Adds a popup to confirm if you want to restart the level
descriptions.conf-prac: Adds a popup to confirm if you want to enter practice mode
descriptions.coin-tracers: Draws a line to secret / user coins in the level
descriptions.auto-practice: Automatically puts you into practice mode when you open a level
descriptions.auto-practice/demons-only: Only puts you into practice mode if the level is a demon
descriptions.auto-coins: Automatically collect coins in a level
descriptions.verify-hack: Allows you upload levels without verifying them
descriptions.smooth-editor-trail: Updates the editor trail at your screen refresh rate instead of 30 fps
descriptions.level-edit: Allows you to edit any level
descriptions.custom-star-rating: Allows you to set a custom star rating on a level
descriptions.copy-hack: Allows you to copy any level from the servers
descriptions.wave-trail-size: Change the size of the wave trail
descriptions.unlock-buttons: Visually Unlocks the greyed out buttons in the online page
descriptions.solid-wave: Makes the wave trail a solid colour
descriptions.no-wave-pulse: Stops the wave from pulsing to the music
descriptions.no-trail-blending: Disables blending on the normal player trail
descriptions.no-spider-dash: Hides the spider dash effect when you teleport
descriptions.no-ship-fire: Hides the fire behind the ship while it's flying
descriptions.no-robot-fire: Hides the fire under the robot while it's boosting
descriptions.no-blink: Disables the blinking when the player respawns
descriptions.plat-jump-anim: Disables the squish animation when jumping in <cc>platformer mode</c>
descriptions.no-lightning: Disables the lightning when touching certain portals
descriptions.no-glow:
Disables object glow.
Requires re-entering the level to apply
descriptions.no-death: Disables the death effect on the player
descriptions.no-dash-fire: Hides the fire behind your icon when using a dash orb
descriptions.no-circles: Disables circle effects such as the one when you touch an orb
descriptions.longer-trail: Lengthens your player's trail length by a factor of 3x
descriptions.longer-trail/player-only: Only makes player trails longer, ignoring all other trail effects ingame
descriptions.hide-percent-after-complete: Fades out the progress bar and percentage label after a level is completed
descriptions.trail-off/wave-only: Force the trail off only when in the wave gamemode
descriptions.blur-background: Blurs the background behind the mod menu
descriptions.no-open-in-level:
Makes it so you can't open the mod menu while in a level.
Just incase you accidentally bump the tab button
descriptions.smooth-move: Moves the button smoothly to where you put it
descriptions.allow-dragging: Allows the button to be dragged
descriptions.hide-btn: Hides the button to open the mod
descriptions.save-pos: Saves the position of the button between game launches
descriptions.seperate-colour-cheat-name: Changes the colour of mod names if it is a cheat
descriptions.speedhack/music: Speedhack all sound by your speed modifier
descriptions.full-options: Replaces the mini options menu in the pause menu with the full options menu
descriptions.search/show-options: Shows mod options in the search results
descriptions.auto-song: Automatically downloads songs when you open a level
descriptions.pitch-shifter/music-only: Only changes the pitch of music
descriptions.trail-cutting: Change the fps that the trail updates at, similar to 2.1
descriptions.create-custom-reward: Creates a custom chest that gives you rewards of your choice
descriptions.noclip/player1: Disabling this allows player 1 to die with noclip on
descriptions.noclip/player2: Disabling this allows player 2 to die with noclip on
descriptions.noclip/player1/use-min-accuracy: Allows the player to die when their accuracy drops below the specified percentage
descriptions.noclip/player2/use-min-accuracy: Allows the player to die when their accuracy drops below the specified percentage
descriptions.noclip/player1/use-max-deaths: Allows the player to die when their noclip death count goes above the specified count
descriptions.noclip/player2/use-max-deaths: Allows the player to die when their noclip death count goes above the specified count
descriptions.show-hitboxes-on-death/death-object-only: Only shows the hitbox for the object you died to
descriptions.show-hitboxes-on-death/trail: Allows hitbox trail to work with show hitboxes on death
descriptions.search-on-keypress: Switches to the search tab when you press a keybind
descriptions.shortcut/restart-attempt: Restarts the current attempt if you are in a level
descriptions.shortcut/toggle-practice: Toggles practice mode if you are in a level
descriptions.safe-mode/end-screen-cheat-indicator: Shows a cheat indicator on the end screen
descriptions.tps-bypass: Allows your physics to update at a different "frame rate" than the default 240
